content: Shopping Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Sep 2019What is the best and cheapest way to buy stuff from US companies that do not ship to Singapore?Planning to purchase some niche stuff from US fo sell in Singapore but they do not have the option to ship to Singapore. What solutions are there for this?2 answersAnswerBump0

Angeline TeoLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 15 Sep 2019Ezbuy.sg is the cheapest way to ship from the USA right now.These 3 are the most competitive ways to buy from USA (That do not ship to Singapore)1) Ezbuy.sg2) vPost3) comGatewayHave a good time shopping!0 comments0
Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Sep 2019Freight forwarders like vpost. Do note that some items are prohibited from being imported here0 comments0
